Tyrael: I think your idea has merit, but we would need to find an 
excuse for me and Naga. We are, after all, Techno-organics, and I 
doubt that the Maximals know about this.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Shadow Star:  Should we come at the Maximals under
> cover of Alliance or as an enemy?
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Tyrael sat at his desk. As Shadow Star enters, the
> > door automatically 
> > closes behind him (auto-doors, no tricks if you
> > ask).
> > 
> > Tyrael:What I have to say has to remain between us
> > only. I presume 
> > that Megatron has gone back to prehistoric Earth and
> > that those 
> > foolish Maximals followed him. We have to remain a
> > secret 
> > organization, and in this goal, we have to eradicate
> > anyone who comes 
> > in contact with our group before we are to leave.
> > Also, we have to 
> > learn what the Predacons are up to. I will leave
> > this to you. 
> > Questions?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> > wrote:
> > > SS follows.
> > > 
> > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > Tyrael: I have to speak with you, Shadow Star.
> > > > Talon, find the third 
> > > > planet of this system and place us on high
> > orbit.
> > > > Report when you're 
> > > > done. Lieutenant, come in my office, please.
> > > > 
> > > > The glowing robot walks away and into the room
> > he
> > > > called his office. 
> > > > He waits for Shadow Star.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart
> > <dewboy30816@y...>
> > > > wrote:
> > > > > Shadow Star:  What about me?
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > > > > > Tyrael: We are all good, as you can see. I
> > > > suggest
> > > > > > that you go to the 
> > > > > > CR chamber for some times until we track
> > > > Megatron.
> > > > > > My theory should 
> > > > > > prove me right or wrong soon enough about
> > this. 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14"
> > > > <black_ben14@h...>
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > -Naga-
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > He took a big part of his strenght to take
> > the
> > > > > > chair away "Yeah,what 
> > > > > > > about you and the others?" he said while
> > > > getting
> > > > > > up.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Azure The Warrior"
> > > > > > <wingedwarrior41@h...> 
> > > > > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > OOC: I'm sending this because Ben's post
> > > > ended

> > > > > > > >

> > get
> > > > there
> > > > > > so sorry
> > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > As he slowly regain consciousness, he
> > still
> > > > > > didn't have enough
> > > > > > > > strenght but Naga knew it would come
> > back
> > > > > > soon."I'm...here 
> > > > > > > Tyreal..."

> > try
> > > > to
> > > > > > have Tyreal's 
> > > > > > > attention.
